title: SIS 2026 Session - Rome
text: Session on Advances in Extreme Value Modeling at SIS-FENStats conference 22-25 June 2026.

title: CIRCE Meeting 2026 - Milan
text:
Date: 26 January 2025 **Location: Bocconi University (Aula 205, Via Sarfatti 25)
Program | Time | Session | Discussant | |:—:|:—|:—| | 09:45 – 10:10 | Registration & Opening | | | 10:10 – 10:50 | David CarlAccurate Bayesian inference for tail risk extrapolation in time series | Marco Bee | | 10:50 – 11:30 | Carlotta PacificiDipping both Toes into Likelihood-Based Inference for Extremes: From Standard to Advanced Methods | Ilaria Prosdocimi | | 11:30 – 11:40 | Break | | | 11:40 – 12.20 | Nicola GneccoExtremes of Structural Causal Models | Carlo Gaetan | | 12:20 – 14:00 | Lunch | | | 14:00 – 14:30 | CIRCE Meeting | | | 14:30 – 15:10 | Roberta PappadàTBD | Amir Khorrami | | 15:10 – 15:50 | Lorenzo Dell’OroExtended modelling of spatial extremes with Gaussian location-scale mixtures | Paola Bortot | | 15:50 – 16:00 | Break | | | 16:00 – 16:40 | Matteo SchiavoneTBD | Fabrizio Laurini | | 16:40 – 17:00 | Closing remarks | |

Contact: send an email to luca.trapin@unibo.it if you want to join.

{.striped .hover}

title: Resources
text:
This page collects links to resources useful to Italian researchers in Extreme Value Statistics.
Interesting resources about extremes are:

Next EVA conference
One World Extreme Extremes seminars
GLEN: a sister network on extremes
Extremes Journal
CRAN Extreme Value Analysis Task View

Useful links for Italian Statisticians:

SIS (Società Italiana di Statistica, Italian Statistical Society)

title: CIRCE
text: CIRCE (Community of Italian Researchers Connecting on Extreme Value Statistics).

title: CIRCE
text:
Aim and community coordinators
The aim of the community is to create a space for Italian researchers interested in Extreme Value Statistics to network and interact. It was established in January 2026 during the first CIRCE meeting.
Currently the Community is coordinated by

Simone Padoan
Ilaria Prosdocimi
Luca Trapin

title: CIRCE
text:
How to join
You can email any of the coordinators to be added to the community.

title: About
text:
CIRCE (Community of Italian Researchers Connecting on Extreme Value Statistics).

The aim of the community is to create a space for Italian researchers interested in Extreme Value Statistics to network and interact. It was established in January 2026
Currently the Community is coordinated by

Simone Padoan
Ilaria Prosdocimi
Luca Trapin
